subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Olli Jokinen scored a power-play goal 7 minutes 12 seconds into the third period Friday night to help the Florida Panthers to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Rangers.
snippet: Olli Jokinen scored a power-play goal 7 minutes 12 seconds into the third period Friday night to help the Florida Panthers to a 3-2 victory over the visiting Rangers.
